entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as having a list of books and school equipment with him.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is a person who is being helped by Dumbledore to find his list of books and school equipment.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a location where Riddle can find the things he needs. It is mentioned as being accessible through the Leaky Cauldron.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is a location that serves as an entrance to Diagon Alley.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is the barman at the Leaky Cauldron. He shares his name with Riddle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is observing Dumbledore and Riddle's conversation.

relationships.description: Dumbledore helps Riddle find his list of books and school equipment.
Diagon Alley is a location where Dumbledore can help Riddle find the things he needs.
The Leaky Cauldron serves as an entrance to Diagon Alley, which Riddle can access.
Tom shares his name with Riddle.
Harry observes Dumbledore's conversation with Riddle.
